title: Designing Advanced Social Job Training Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Work experience in social fields and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: ADDIE model-based blended learning training development for advanced professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five phases of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation) to practical cases in blended learning environments
Learners can effectively integrate online (e-learning) and offline (face-to-face) learning elements according to job characteristics (theory/practice)
Learners can measure learning outcomes using formative assessment tools in small-group real-time online education

resources: Sample Digital Instructional Materials for Practical Training

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
